attributes.action: Reduce from 120 days the qualifying period for award of the general Service Medal for service during the troubles in Cyprus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There were many men, and women, who served in Cyprus for 2 or more months but not the 120 days that are currently required for this award.
I am sure that there are many ex- servicemen who would be prepared to pay for the GSM if the time limit were reduced
